item.title: 23 Taylor Swift Deleted Tweets That Prove She's Actually Pretty Funny
item.description:
Taylor Swift deleted all her tweets, so I went looking for them â€” and I found out she’s actually kinda funny. Go figure.

That time she told Demi Lovato she could smell like a rotting corpse.

Twitter / Via pinterest.com

That time she was deep inside the womb of a cat.

Twitter / Via buzzfeed.com

The time she battled addiction.

Twitter / Via buzzfeed.com

That time she made a good point about packaging.

Twitter / Via buzzfeed.com

That time she taunted Brad Paisley with his own song (he has a song called "Little Moments").

Twitter / Via pinterest.com

That time she broke the curtains.

Twitter / Via pinterest.com

That time she broke the car.

Twitter / Via pinterest.com

That time she got stuck in traffic.

Twitter / Via pinterest.com

That time she was reading a hotel shampoo bottle.

Twitter / Via pinterest.com

That time she had food all over her face.

Twitter / Via pinterest.com

That time she made a good point about hair ties.

Twitter / Via pinterest.com

That time she tried to pay in shells.

Twitter / Via pinterest.com

That time she broke her remote control.

Twitter / Via buzzfeed.com

That time she made a b'day wish.

Twitter / Via pinterest.com

That time she discovered nature's pepper spray.

Twitter / Via pinterest.com

That time she exposed the month of October.

Twitter / Via thisswiftbeat.tumblr.com

That time she was basically Lady Gaga.

Twitter / Via nothingeverleftyouscarred.tumblr.com

That time she googled frogs.

Twitter / Via getswift-blog.tumblr.com

That time she basically told her cat to smile.

Twitter

That time she wasn't building a castle.

Twitter / Via thisloveglows1989.tumblr.com

That time she was jet-lagged.

Twitter / Via treacherousxslope.tumblr.com

That time she was concerned for viral video stars.

Twitter / Via theperksoftaylorswift.tumblr.com

And that time she was both 80 and 5 at the same time.

Twitter / Via echoesof-mine.tumblr.com
item.author: Matt Stopera

media:content.media:description: Taylor Swift deleted all her tweets, so I went looking for them — and I found out she's actually kinda funny. Go figure.

item.title: Would You Be A Better Date Than My New Man?
item.description:
You probably don’t even measure up to him, but you can try.

This is my new gentleman friend, Percy. He is superb. Do you think you compare to him at all? I doubt it, but I guess we'll find out.

We have smooched twice.

Thinkstock

item.title: This Is What A Partridge Looks Like, Just So You Know
item.description:
In case you ever need to spot one in an actual pear tree.

It's that time of year again, when you sing along merrily to "12 Days of Christmas" and wonder to yourself what the hell a partridge even looks like.

Shelma1 / Getty Images

Well folks, here is a red-legged partridge.

Mikelane45 / Getty Images

And here's a grey partridge. In fact, there are lots of kinds of partridges and they all look generally the same, all things considered.

Pum_eva / Getty Images

giphy.com

Happy caroling, everyone!

Omearadesign / Getty Images
item.author: Elaina Wahl

media:content.media:description: In case you ever need to spot one in an actual pear tree.

item.title: 13 Worst Things About Working In An Office
item.description:
For anyone who has business colleagues.

The huge origami assignments that don't include any instructions.

David Woolley / Getty Images

When you are late to the mandatory desaturation meetings.

Moodboard / Getty Images

The team pictures when Frank insists on standing in front of everyone.

Jupiterimages / Getty Images

And the weekly check-ins when Rob doesn't pay attention, just sits at another table and smiles to himself.

Chagin / Getty Images

Every Thursday when your boss makes you and your team spell "ETHIC."

Stockvisual / Getty Images

When you ask for help collating an expense report and your colleague just does this.

Dmitrii Kotin / Getty Images

When all your colleagues pass around an email saying, "we're doing away with chairs. Sitting is over."

Monkeybusinessimages / Getty Images

But you say, "hey I like using chairs. Please don't take it."

Chris_tefme / Getty Images

Next thing you know, you wake up, your chair's gone and your colleagues are chanting "one of us, one of us."

Michaeljung / Getty Images

And then they ask you if you can read the special laptop and you don't see anything on the screen but you just go along with it because you're in too deep now.

Andreypopov / Getty Images

When at the end of the day they ask that you put your hand in and repeat the company mantra, "The power is in the hands."

G-stockstudio / Getty Images

When you sincerely don't know what is going on, but everyone seems to have bought your act.

Oneblink-cj / Getty Images

Except for Pete, you're pretty sure he knows your secret.

Steve Hix / Getty Images
item.author: Nathan W. Pyle

media:content.media:description: For anyone who has business colleagues.

item.title: I Cleaned My Ass With A Bidet And This Is What Happened
item.description:
Not that I needed to, because girls don’t poop or anything.

Perhaps you've heard of the bidet, a sink-type fixture (or sometimes just a feature of an otherwise normal toilet) that is used to wash the genitals and/or anus.

Does the idea of spraying your private parts with water freak you out? Maybe you've heard of bidets, but deemed them too European for your tastes?

Fear not for I, your brave leader, shall go forth into the land of water and asses. Follow me, my children.

Fox

So how can A GIRL review a bidet? Simple. Girls can use bidets to 'clean lipstick off of their faces.'

('Putting on/taking off lipstick' here is a euphemism for pooping. Please consult the below chart for reference.)

ThinkStock

If you Google search "Tushy bidet," you may find some results you weren't (but should have been) anticipating. I used the Tushy brand bidet; I did NOT watch Tushy anal porn in HD.

At least not for this article.

Tushy claims that the bidet will be "easier to install than it is to poop," but this is definitely not true as I have never needed to employ the services of a handyman to help me poop.

There are not many steps, but you have to be good at unscrewing things as well as comfortable fiddling around your toilet, and I am neither of those things. But when I had trouble installing my attachment, I chatted with the people at Tushy, who were extremely helpful, and after a day of online consultation, the Tushy was installed.

google.com

BOTTOM line: Is the bidet a bi-DO or a bi-DON'T?

Yes, you sASSy bitch, it's a bi-DO. Sure, I would love to try one with warm water, but I also know that would require more installation prowess than I currently possess. So I'll wait.

I will say, however, that if you are an infrequent wearer of lipstick, it might not be worth it. You probably don't use much toilet paper anyway. But, if you have sensitive skin, hemorrhoids, or a child, you could definitely benefit from a bidet. Also, if you enjoy the feeling of water being sprayed up your butthole, you should get one.

Oh fuck, I said butthole.

*sound of the illusion shattering into a million pieces*

Cartoon Network
item.author: Sarah Burton

media:group.media:description: Not that I needed to, because girls don't poop or anything.

media:content.media:description: Does the idea of spraying your private parts with water freak you out? Maybe you've heard of bidets, but deemed them too European for your tastes? Fear not for I, your brave leader, shall go forth into the land of water and asses. Follow me, my children.
So how can A GIRL review a bidet? Simple. Girls can use bidets to 'clean lipstick off of their faces.'

If that sounds excessive to you, don't worry. Doctors say it is normal to put lipstick on anywhere from three times a day to three times a week. Any less than three times a week, though, and you may be constipated, and you should talk to your doctor. Honestly, the feeling I get from putting on a great lipstick is second only to orgasming. But as any lipstick lover knows, no matter how great it may feel to wear that lipstick, it can be a pain in the ass to get off.
Bidet attachments range from $18-$80 online, but the one I tested was the Tushy Cool Bidet, available for $57.

At least not for this article. Tushy claims that the bidet will be "easier to install than it is to poop," but this is definitely not true as I have never needed to employ the services of a handyman to help me poop. There are not many steps, but you have to be good at unscrewing things as well as comfortable fiddling around your toilet, and I am neither of those things. But when I had trouble installing my attachment, I chatted with the people at Tushy, who were extremely helpful, and after a day of online consultation, the Tushy was installed.

Here I am wearing a lipstick called Kylie Jenner’s True Brown, or as I call it, Après-Chipotle. As you can see, I’ve wiped, and yet, I’ve really only just smudged the brown lipstick around. It will take several more wipes to remove all of the lipstick, and even after that, I have to look in the mirror to be sure it's really gone. Honestly, sometimes it's like you're not even wiping your lips, you're just wiping your lipstick around into a bigger area than it covered before.

Here is lipstick removal using the bidet. The power of water, people. Use a five-second splash and wiggle if you have to. Your lipstick will be very gone. This makes sense. You clean your dirty, dirty body in a shower. So it does make sense that you'd want to clean your dirty mouth (etc.) with water, right? All a bidet is is a steady stream of water. According to my trustworthy source, bidets predate modern toilets, and in Italy, 97% of households have them. To be clear, the bidet did not have a 100% success rate at removing all lipstick in one shot. I used several sprays. But even in those instances, the water certainly felt nicer on my lips than the often-scratchy toilet paper. However, the bidet left my lips very wet, so I patted them dry with toilet paper. There is no true escape from toilet paper, for any of us.

1. Do NOT immediately turn the bidet on full blast. You will not be ready. That is varsity bidet use, and you must work your way up to it. 2. Close your legs. Trust me on this. If your legs aren't closed, the water will find that open space, shoot through it, and splash the opposite wall. I'm a feminist, but still, my advice to you is: close your legs. Sorry. 3. You might have to wiggle. Especially your first time. The water will probably hit the correct general area, but it might not be a blowing-up-the-Death-Star-type shot on your first try.

Yes, you sASSy bitch, it's a bi-DO. Sure, I would love to try one with warm water, but I also know that would require more installation prowess than I currently possess. So I'll wait. I will say, however, that if you are an infrequent wearer of lipstick, it might not be worth it. You probably don't use much toilet paper anyway. But, if you have sensitive skin, hemorrhoids, or a child, you could definitely benefit from a bidet. Also, if you enjoy the feeling of water being sprayed up your butthole, you should get one. Oh fuck, I said butthole. *sound of the illusion shattering into a million pieces*

item.title: 12 Christmas Presents For Someone That You'll Never Ever EVER Bone
item.description:
For friends who are close enough to give each other presents but not close enough to kiss.

McDonald's Gift Card - $$$

"We will never go on a date here."

mcdonalds.com

Poo-Pourri Pre-poop Spray - $9.99

Nothing says "stay away from my butt" better than a reminder we all poop.

amazon.com

3-Piece BFF Necklace - $8.99

Just to be clear that you're not only friends, but there is another friend of equal standing.

amazon.com

Mouse Taxidermy Kit - $37

This will not bring out romantic feelings.

afieldguide.org

J Crew Socks - $28

Avoid if you suspect a foot fetish.

jcrew.com

Sitz Bath - $5.99

"Aids in relieving the discomfort of perinea conditions such as hemorrhoids, menstrual cramps, bladder or prostate infections!"

amazon.com

Sorry! Board Game - $7.99

Assuming they want to be more than friends, this gets the message across.

amazon.com

Lottery Ticket - $$$

Only sometimes disappointing!

Ingram Publishing / Getty Images

"The Executioner" Mosquito Swatter - $19.99

Or any other pseudo-useful present "As Seen On TV."

amazon.com

A Donation To Charity In Their Name - $$$

It doubles as a holiday gift to yourself in the form of a tax exemption.

Mitrija / Getty Images

BFF Mixtape - $2

Message received loud and clear.

Urs Siedentop / Getty Images

Vitamin D Tablets - $7.59

Not to be confused with that other D.

amazon.com
item.author: Sarah Burton

media:content.media:description: For friends who are close enough to give each other presents but not close enough to kiss.
